plot: Mrs. Meinhart wants to contact Peter Becker, who now has no place to stay with the Richters. She asks her acquaintance Mrs. Gerlach to contact the boy. When she shows up at the Beckers, she is immediately recognized, because it was Mrs. Gerlach who had arranged the illegal adoption of Peter at that time. Because father Becker senses an inheritance, he wants to get along with his adopted son again. Meanwhile, Peter is offered a job as an animator in a holiday club. A welcome ray of hope in his current life situation.
